about_the_game:
Gameplay Features

Build your harem empire as the Squid King and corrupt the ladies to reveal their true nature. Every game in the "Corrupt Them All" series is interconnected, sharing progression in terms of upgrades and the main storyline.

  • You will gain new abilities as you play, which will always help you progress faster.

  • As the Squid King, you will level up, allowing you to upgrade abilities and commit to specific strategies.

  • At the same time, as you gain experience, your targets become corrupted. If you manage to corrupt them before your energy runs out, you advance to their next corruption stage.

  • Each corruption stage reveals a glimpse of the target's lewd side and marks the beginning of their self-discovery as they join your harem.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
Includes adult content including full nudity, sexual scenes

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 19.

Be aware that you might encounter heavy mature topics depending on your progression such as, Sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM themes, drug/alcohol implication (Never graphically shown but can be implied), self-harm and/or suicide (Never graphically shown but implied).

short_description: Corrupt Them All, a clicker corruption dating sim. Expose their true nature and encourage them in their dirty self-discovery journey that they've been hiding. Click, Corrupt, Build your harem empire.
